name: plotly-airfoil
description: A Karman-Trefftz airfoil using forthcoming plotly.js features

scripts.build:html: echo '' | indexhtmlify | htmlinjectscript -a -b "https://rawgit.com/rreusser/plotly-airfoil-example/master/bundle.js" | metadataify | github-cornerify > index.html
scripts.build: npm run build:data && npm run build:js && npm run build:html

author: Ricky Reusser
